name: Cemu
content:
files:
- cemu: http://cemu.info/releases/cemu_1.18.0.zip
- controller: https://lutris.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/cemu/Xbox_Controller.txt
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/cemu/Cemu.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/cemu
    file: cemu
- write_file:
    content: bleh
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/cemu/controllerProfiles/Xbox_Controller.txt
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/cemu/controllerProfiles
    src: controller
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    R600_DEBUG: nohyperz
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
    vblank_mode: 0
wine:
  esync: true
  overrides:
    dbghelp: native,builtin
    mscoree: disabled
    mshtml: disabled
